title: Chapter 2550: The Young Man’S Spirit Flourishes (3)
body:
Chapter 2550: The Young Man’S Spirit Flourishes (3)

Chapter 2550: The Young Man’s Spirit Flourishes (3)

Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

“You’re talking to a man who risked his life to complete Lord Shou’s mission. But remember, it’s not your mission, Li Fugui. You’re talking to a loyal frontline soldier!”

“You should show some respect.” Zhu Yike said calmly.

Li Fugui was stunned for an instant, but his lips curled into a sneer that he quickly suppressed. “This was Lord Shou’s intention.”

Zhu Yike was furious. He slammed the table, stood up and shouted again.

“I think this is your intention, Li Fugui!”

“I think you, Li Fugui, are addicted to issuing irrelevant orders. You want to order me around!”

“Even if it’s through the communication bead.”

“Do you really think that you can order me around when we meet?”

“I could not see you, so there was no way I could hit you. Now when we meet face to face, you dare to show me your colors? Who do you think you are!”

Zhu Yike grabbed the teacup in his hand and his fingertips suddenly moved.

Li Fugui did not even have time to respond before he felt that something had gone missing from his body. He suddenly felt a chill in his legs as he lifted them up.

The teacup in Zhu Yike’s hand disappeared, and in its place was a pair of red underwear that hung from his fingertips.

“Yo, you like triangles?”

“You’re still in your zodiac year? You need to be careful in your zodiac year, in your words and deeds!”

The room instantly went deadly silent. It was so silent that one could hear a pin drop.

Li Fugui’s lips twitched, his eyelids twitched, and his outstretched hand trembled…

Good! Good! Good!

How dare you steal my underwear? You really have a death wish!

“Lord Shou!”

He let out a wail and rubbed his tear-filled eyes. “Look at what Zhu Yike did!”

Lord Shou?

Zhu Yike hurriedly hid the underwear and looked around, shocked.

However, there was no sign of Lord Shou in this rundown room?

Li Fugui said that if there was a possibility, there was a small chance that he could see Lord Shou.

However, after Lord Shou’s battle with the Holy Emperor, he should still be recuperating.

Otherwise, he would only need to use a great spatial shift to save them.

“You tricked me?”

Zhu Yike was furious.

This sissy Li was crying, what was wrong with him?

If he didn’t teach him a lesson today, did he really think that since Lord Shou of the First Pavilion in the Sky was not here, he would be the king?

“That’s enough!”

At this moment, Lord Shou’s voice came from Li Fugui’s body. A sound came from the array formation.

“It doesn’t matter if it’s a black cat or a white cat, as long as it can catch mice, it’s a good cat.”

“Zhu Yike isn’t weak, and Li Fugui is also very good. You’re both talents of the First Pavilion in the Sky. Why are you fighting?”

“Ah, yes.” Li Fugui lowered his head respectfully.

“You, you, you…” Zhu Yike was dumbfounded. He pointed at the treacherous and vicious Old Li and remained speechless for a long time.

Lord Shou is within your body?

Why didn’t you say so earlier!

“Lord Shou?” He called out again with uncertainty.

“Give him back his underwear first.” Li Fugui puffed out his chest proudly, and his voice came out precisely from his body.

A fox using a tiger’s might!

This was truly a fox borrowing the tiger’s might!

Li Fugui, you Li Fugui, you really deserve to die…

Zhu Yike almost vomited blood, but he could only helplessly return the underwear.

He would remember today’s grudge. How dare he keep Lord Shou hidden and scheme against him? This intelligence rat who only knew how to steal information!

“Give me the items first.” Lord Shou stopped fooling around and quickly returned to the main topic. “The people have already been brought here. It should not be a problem after that.”

“Yes.”

After Li Fugui responded, he began to take things out of his spatial ring.

The first thing he took out was the jade talisman given by Lord Shou, the jade talisman that allowed him to pass through the Apricot Realm…

Sigh, I really don’t want to give it back to you!

At the same time.

There were a lot of people walking about on the streets.

Dongdong looked at the signboard that read ‘Ugly Pig Hide Shop’ that was nearby. She hesitated for a moment before she took out a command token from her chest.

Jade Capital City, Southern Zone gate, City Leaving Token.
